sentences.en: Patsy’s father is a typical suburbanite.
sentences.cn: 帕奇的父亲是个典型的郊区人。

sentences.en: Which ups the odds a mosquito a suburbanite may have recently a bird carrying the virus.
sentences.cn: 因此一只嗡嗡飞向市郊居民的蚊子,刚刚叮过带有病毒的鸟的可能性就增加了.

trans.tran_en: someone who lives in a suburb – often used to show disapproval
